feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts
feed.subtitle: Posts. That have been deleted. From MetaFilter.

entry.title: Lab Origin?
entry.content:
Post 187687 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: This doesn't seem to be supported by the scientific community at all -- taz

entry.title: a metaphor for 2020
entry.content:
Post 187692 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry for the delayed delete here; based on the reactions I think this is landing less as an intended oh-no-but-fun thing and more as a wow-legitimately-wish-I-hasn't-watched-that thing for folks -- LobsterMitten
entry.summary: Post 187692 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry for the delayed delete here; based on the reactions I think this is landing less as an intended oh-no-but-fun thing and more as a wow-legitimately-wish-I-hasn't-watched-that thing for folks -- LobsterMitten

entry.title: Proposal of a new Holiday
entry.content:
Post 187694 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey sorry, Betty White is great but this isn't really the form for a Metafilter post. I'm going to email you if you want to discuss more and work on an edited version. -- LobsterMitten
entry.summary: Post 187694 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey sorry, Betty White is great but this isn't really the form for a Metafilter post. I'm going to email you if you want to discuss more and work on an edited version. -- LobsterMitten

entry.title: Ip Gissa Gul
entry.content:
Post 187695 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: This comic (the caveman-language and other caveman tropes, kidnapping a woman who fights back and then is miserable bearing children) is going to land very differently for Mefites today than it would have in 1975. Maybe better to post it with more context or in some way that doesn't just rely on readers taking it as if they had 1975 sensibilities? -- LobsterMitten
entry.summary: Post 187695 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: This comic (the caveman-language and other caveman tropes, kidnapping a woman who fights back and then is miserable bearing children) is going to land very differently for Mefites today than it would have in 1975. Maybe better to post it with more context or in some way that doesn't just rely on readers taking it as if they had 1975 sensibilities? -- LobsterMitten

entry.content:
Post 346064 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey sorry this seems like "let's brainstorm" but since you don't have input on the process (?) it's more asking just to idly discuss, which makes it chatfilter. -- LobsterMitten

entry.title: Oh, I wasn’t talking about you, didn’t mean to hurt you.

link.title: Oh, I wasn’t talking about you, didn’t mean to hurt you.

entry.content:
Post 187674 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: I know Scalzi's a MeFi local but I don't feel like this blog post or him personally makes a lot of sense as the thing to center further discussion about this on; he's got a comment section on that post which seems like a good place to engage with his writing specifically, and if there's a post to be made about some of the folks whose behavior he's discussing as fuckups beyond the existing Temkin and Ellis threads it should probably be framed more around those folks directly. -- cortex
